name: AutoFight
description:
Made in 1 week by 1 person.

HoudiniJam was a blast so much fun with this project!

Thanks, @SidefFX for such cool software!

How did you use Houdini to make your game?

-PDG and HDA combo for Character Generation (Geo, Skininig,Export)

-SyncView for preview

-GameJams tool for level design;

List everything that was made before the jam. Pre-built assets, textures, etc

Music, sounds, some of environmental assets

Which game engine or platform did you use to make your game?

Unity3D
